system.descriptionText:
Character chooses one or more of their Comrades in Cohesion to Participate in this Order.
Make a -10 Command Test, with +10 per Comrade Particpating, if successful until the end of the turn when making a Charge Action, can move +X Metres and gain +X damage to charge attacks, where X is number of Degrees of Success on test. Can only use this order once per combat encounter.
